div.ab:
One whitens very strongly & one cleans the
guards
well. Next, one applies
walnut
olive
oil
all over them with a
feather
while they are cold, and next turns them over a good
charcoal
fire that is on the
furbishers
â€™ furnace
, without them touching the
charcoal
or the
ash
. And when they do not
smoke
anymore, it is done.
